allow: Bash(# Check for any auth-related files find ~/.claude -name ""*token*"" -o -name ""*auth*"" -o -name ""*cred*"" -o -name ""*oauth*"")
Bash(# Check for any files that might contain credentials find ~/.claude -type f -name ""*.json"" | xargs grep -l ""oauthAccount\\|apiKey\\|token\\|bearer"")

Bash(# Check for oauthAccount in identity config vs main config grep -l ""oauthAccount"" ~/.claude/.claude.json && echo ""Found in main ~/.claude/"" grep -l ""oauthAccount"" ~/.claude/identities/michelstorms/.claude.json && echo ""Found in identity config"" # Show the structure grep ""oauthAccount"" ~/.claude/identities/michelstorms/.claude.json)
Bash(# Check main Claude directory for tokens cat ~/.claude/.claude.json)
